input_text:
Job Title: Machine Operator 2- 1st shift- Hole Saw Fab

Location: Greenwood, MS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Machine Operator 2

Job Description

The Machine Operator 2 is responsible for operating production equipment and meeting area production goals . 

Duties And Responsibilities

Set up and operate assigned equipmentMay use computer to load printer softwareLoad/unload sealing and printing equipment with product and packaging materialRecognize and react to problems with equipment, make adjustments as requiredInspect and verify product according to quality standardsWork with Set Up Technician to resolve problems with equipmentClean equipment as required to ensure proper operationBreak down scrap packagesAble to work effectively within small teamsAccurately complete scrap ticketsAccurately complete daily production sheetAccurately update hourly goal boardMaintain production pace and standardsAdhere to all safety requirements in the work areaPractice 5Ss

Knowledge, Skills And Abilities

Understand and follow verbal and written instructionsBasic math skillsBasic mechanical skillsBasic computer skills

Education And Experience Requirements

High school diploma or equivalent1-2 years of machine operation experience

Physical and Weight Lifting Demands

The physical and weight lifting demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
